mapper.select: /* MasterDAO.masterHakwonAllList */ select a.hakwon_no , a.master_user_no , a.hakwon_code , a.reg_date , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y년%m월%d일 %H:%i') as reg_date , b.hakwon_name , a.hakwon_status , get_code_name('012', a.hakwon_status) as hakwon_status_name , a.hakwon_cate , get_cate_name(a.hakwon_cate) as hakwon_cate_name , get_file_path(b.logo_file_no) as logo_file_path , (select count(1) from tb_hakwon_teacher where hakwon_no = a.hakwon_no and approved_yn = 'Y' ) teacher_count , (select count(1) from tb_hakwon_member where hakwon_no = a.hakwon_no and user_type = '006' ) student_count , (select count(1) from tb_hakwon_member where hakwon_no = a.hakwon_no and user_type = '005' ) parents_count from tb_hakwon a , tb_hakwon_info b where a.master_user_no = #{user_no} and a.hakwon_no = b.hakwon_no order by b.hakwon_name asc
